description: A cinch to prepare and perfect as a weeknight dinner, master a speedy homemade pasta sauce with our spaghetti and rustic tomato sauce recipe.
name: Spaghetti With Rustic Tomato Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add pasta, 1/4 cup parmesan and reserved cooking liquid to tomato mixture. Cook, tossing, over low heat for 1 minute or until combined. Serve topped with remaining parmesan and basil leaves.
